item.title: Daily Readings and Assignments
item.description: Tomorrow’s Reading and Assignments Before class tomorrow, please complete the following: Day 4: Read: Sketch 12 Do: Sketch 12: problems 3, 4, 7 Note for problem 3, here’s Euclid’s Elements Online Day 3: Read: Sketch 2 Sketch 4 Do: Sketch 2 questions 1, 4, 5 Sketch 4 questions 4, 6, 7 The Citation Activity linked here. You don’t need to turn anything in - answers will be posted tomorrow - but like all assignments, please do your best.
